EventComponent.Name: Day Leagues
EventComponent.Title: Day Leagues
EventComponent.Abstract:
This is a pilot program that will be offered from 12pm to 3pm Mondays, Wednesdays, and Fridays. Day Leagues will offer more opportunities for those available to play during these times. This program is being developed to offer different sports and leagues to appeal to a braoder range of participants. Because it is a pilot program, it will be subject to change to appeal the participats.
Free to Play One hour a week Meet new people Be social New Sport options provided Break from class/work
These sports are being offered: 5x5 Outdoor Futsal, 4x4 Flag Football, and 5x5 Ultimate Frisbee.
Sign up on imleagues. Click the link to sign up!
